title: 23 Cat Memes Coming Like Knights in Shining Armor to Save You From Sadness
description: What would we ever do without cats in our lives? It's hard to answer that question, mainly because we don't want to even think of the possibility of not having cats in our lives. When we think about this we get anxious, so we simply prefer to not think about this possibility ever and go to cuddle our cute cat immediately. Because how's that even possible to comprehend a life without a cat in it? We want to always have cats in our lives, in every moment. We're sure that every cat pawrent feels the same way about their fluffy feline friends.We don't want you either to think of this depressing state of not having cats in your life. On the contrary - we want you to have as many cats as you want in your life! Now, we cannot, unfortunately, bring you a cat right to your doorstep - but we can definitely increase the amount of wholesome cat memes you look at. We gathered some of the cutest cat memes for this exact reason, so, enjoy!
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: 23 Cat Memes Coming Like Knights in Shining Armor to Save You From Sadness - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
What would we ever do without cats in our lives? It's hard to answer that question, mainly because we don't want to even think of the possibility of not having cats in our lives. When we think about this we get anxious, so we simply prefer to not think about this possibility ever and go to cuddle our cute cat immediately. Because how's that even possible to comprehend a life without a cat in it? We want to always have cats in our lives, in every moment. We're sure that every cat pawrent feels the same way about their fluffy feline friends.

We don't want you either to think of this depressing state of not having cats in your life. On the contrary - we want you to have as many cats as you want in your life! Now, we cannot, unfortunately, bring you a cat right to your doorstep - but we can definitely increase the amount of wholesome cat memes you look at. We gathered some of the cutest cat memes for this exact reason, so, enjoy!
